def_en: Christ is one of the names of Jesus, whom Christians believe to be the son of God and whose teachings are the basis of Christianity.

def_cn: (表示震惊、生气等，或加强语气，可能具冒犯意味)天哪！
def_en: Some people say 'Christ!' when they are surprised, shocked, or annoyed, or in order to emphasize what they are saying. This use could cause offence.
